column4: Excuse my ignorance, but can linux handle multiple  monitors?  I found the settings under KDE, but it does not seem to be working (mirroring or spanning).
: using ATI graphics (mobility I think) and Ubuntu 6.0.6.1
does ATI provide linux drivers? have you dowloaded anything related? or are you using the defaults?
you probably have to get specific drivers to solve your issue. i'm not experienced in ATI video cards, always used nvidia.. but they do require specific drivers to unleash their power aswell.
